item.title: Vim digraphs
item.description: This is a pretty good thing if you use symbols that aren’t on your keyboard, like the copyright symbol for example (©). Do you know how much time it took me to insert this symbol? Less than a second… Do you know how much time it would have took you? Well, depending on your internet connection, it might be about 10 seconds. So, how did I do that? I just pressed ctr+k+Co (in insert mode).
